RainbruRPG::Events::erGame

RainbruRPG::Events::erGame Class Reference

#include <ergame.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The Irrlicht Event Recever for gsGame.

This class is instancied and set up to the IrrlichtDevice in the gsGame::run(). If we set up this in gsGame::init(), the IrrlichtDevice isn't yet initialized and it may cause a SegFault.


Public Member Functions

 The event Receiver main loop.
